title: araTTonru pOTTinda
sahitya:
aratTonru pOTTinda manap-pEyanai aDakkiDuvAi appanE


anupallavi

  varaTTu vanAntarattai vaLa nagarinravan puraTTuk-kavi ezhudip-poik-kathai punaiginrAn


caraNam 1    kaTTik-karumbidenrE eTTiyait-taruginrAn kaTrAzhaiyaik-kaTTi muttamiD selgirAn
maTTit-taDiyaruDan manaikkuLLE varugirAn malaDikku sImanta malargaLai muDikkirAn
    caraNam 2    peNNenap-ponnenap-priyattaik-kATTuvAn piDipaTTa mAndarap-pEi ena vATTuvAn
kaNNilE poDi tUvi gandharva lOkangaL kANenap-puli narik-kATTilE OTTuvAn
